name: The Melly Scarf
description:
The Melly scarf is a pdf pattern for a simple, fun, adaptable knitting pattern for personal use.

The scarf is of a ribbed, waved, skinny scarf design, just waiting to be added to your wardrobe and/or given as a present.

Difficulty level: beginner

*This is for a PDF KNIT PATTERN, not for the actual scarf. To make this scarf you must have basic knitting skills, i.e., cast on, knit, pearl, cast off.

On receipt of payment, a PDF file, containing the pattern, will be emailed to you within 48 hours.

If you have an questions about the pattern, please feel free to contact me at any time.
